classes.name: Div
classes.description:
A container is a logical grouping of children. We can add field to container.
 A container has a styleClass that tells how many columns.
 A container will occupy at least 1 row during rendering.


 Example: http://www.w3schools.com/jquerymobile/tryit.asp?filename=tryjqmob_grid_a
 
   
   

   
     Second Column Button
     Second Column: This is some text. This is some text. This is some text. This is some text.
   
 

 Field can be positioned in the container "preferred" column by setting thei

Created by Yanuar Arifin.

classes.name: Session
classes.description:
Session class when a client create a connection to server
 This class possess most of the information regarding the session
 Information like, source application, source page, source field, previous page, previous field and etc.
 Database connection can be retrieved from here too. Any object can be store in here.
